verbose_text: BiP also induced downregulation of CD115 / c-Fms and Receptor Activator of NF-kappaB (RANK) messenger RNA and protein, causing reduced phosphorylation of the p38 mitogen activated protein kinases, extracellular signal regulated kinases 1/2 and p38, with suppression of essential osteoclast transcription factors, c-Fos and NFATc1.
evidence: BiP also induced downregulation of CD115/c-Fms and Receptor Activator of NF-kappaB (RANK) messenger RNA and protein, causing reduced phosphorylation of the p38 mitogen-activated protein kinases
